content:
Though it may be humble,
please accept
my gratitude.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content: Without your help, we couldn't have settled in and built our new home so quickly.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
This way our Astralink will connect to
the Central Station of Metropolis,
which links every Astralink in the Celestial River.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content: At your service!
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content: Hoho, I'm completely confident that leaving all Astralink matters to you from now on would work out just fine.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
Head to the New Wave Division 
in Metropolis to activate your 
Astralink and collect your <color=#8AAB4B>Astralink Road Sign</color>.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
For this journey, you will be accompanied by
Safety Coordinator, Esassani.
May your path be bright and your Astralink clear.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
Next up, we'll soon have
Astralink stations,
connecting more Astralinks!
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content: After all that discussion, we need someone to represent everyone and go to <color=#8AAB4B><ruby:Loomi District>Metropolis</ruby></color>, the world's only district, to handle the related procedures.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
I still remember when you first arrived,
sharing your wishes with everyone over tea.
Hoho, I have a feeling they'll come true soon.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
Just go, mah~!
Other Neighbors are there...
Besides, there's so much to prepare!
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content: Hoho, I'm confident that I can leave all Astralink matters in your hands from now on. You'll handle everything just fine.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content: Me again?! Seriously?!
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content: Esassani drives to the "New Astralink Division." Takes a number and queues up. 3 hours later...
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
Between the rivers in the sky, we travel steadily and freely,
Trading and sharing with more Neighbors,
Better "weaving" our world bubble.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
Hoho hoho~ You really do care about
the Astralink stations, don't you?
Yes, we've completed our Astralink plan!
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
Reliable!
Even when everyone's requests are troublesome, you still handle them earnestly.
Hmm, I'm starting to acknowledge you as...
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
After thinking about it...
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color> is definitely
the perfect choice!
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content: Then I'll leave it to <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, representing <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color>.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
Let's go,
Together!
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3

content: How can I help—Hoho! Oh, it's <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>. I've got something I want to discuss with you.
info: 前往新浪潮事业部_主流程文本3
